Interface InventoryItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InventoryItemImpl

    interface InventoryItem

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String decreaseStock(int decAmount)
      Decrease the quantityInStock by the amount passed as parameter 1.
      int formatReportData_1(java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
      Appends the data from one object, formatted for Report 1, to the StringBuffer passed as parameter 1.
      java.lang.String getPrimaryKey()
      Returns the value of inventoryId (to be used as the key for a Hashtable or database primary key or similar purpose).
      java.lang.String increaseStock(int incAmount)
      Increases the quantityInStock by the amount passed as parameter 1.
      java.lang.String placeSalesOrder(int qtyOrdered)
      Adds the qtyOrdered to totalSalesOrders and returns the message “Sales Order of [qtyOrdered] for [inventoryId].”
      java.lang.String receiveReplenishment(int qtyReceived)
      Reduces the totalOrdered by the qtyReceived then calls increaseStock(qtyReceived).
      java.lang.String shipSalesOrder(int qtyShipped)
      Reduces totalSalesOrders by the qtyShipped then calls decreaseStock(qtyShipped).

    • Method Detail

      • decreaseStock

        java.lang.String decreaseStock(int decAmount)
        Decrease the quantityInStock by the amount passed as parameter 1. Returns the message “Decreased stock of [inventoryId] by [decAmount].”.

      • formatReportData_1

        int formatReportData_1(java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
        Appends the data from one object, formatted for Report 1, to the StringBuffer passed as parameter 1. Returns a possible error indicator (zero means “no errors”.

      • getPrimaryKey

        java.lang.String getPrimaryKey()
        Returns the value of inventoryId (to be used as the key for a Hashtable or database primary key or similar purpose).

      • increaseStock

        java.lang.String increaseStock(int incAmount)
        Increases the quantityInStock by the amount passed as parameter 1. Returns the message “Increased stock of [inventoryId] by [incAmount].”

      • placeSalesOrder

        java.lang.String placeSalesOrder(int qtyOrdered)
        Adds the qtyOrdered to totalSalesOrders and returns the message “Sales Order of [qtyOrdered] for [inventoryId].”

      • receiveReplenishment

        java.lang.String receiveReplenishment(int qtyReceived)
        Reduces the totalOrdered by the qtyReceived then calls increaseStock(qtyReceived).

      • shipSalesOrder

        java.lang.String shipSalesOrder(int qtyShipped)
        Reduces totalSalesOrders by the qtyShipped then calls decreaseStock(qtyShipped).
